survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers on their satisfaction with outdoor adventure gear to improve product offerings and customer service.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase outdoor adventure gear?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of selection.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase outdoor adventure gear?

questions.question_text: Which types of outdoor adventure gear do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection for accurate data capture.

script.question_text: Which types of outdoor adventure gear do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the durability of the outdoor adventure gear you have purchased?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any gear type in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the durability of the outdoor adventure gear you have purchased?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any gear type in Q2

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when purchasing outdoor adventure gear? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selection to 3 options for focused insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selection limit of 3

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when purchasing outdoor adventure gear? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with the outdoor adventure gear you purchased in the past 12 months?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any gear type in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question for quick response.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with the outdoor adventure gear you purchased in the past 12 months?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any gear type in Q2

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the issue(s) you experienced:
questions.routing_logic: Only respondents who answered 'Yes' to Q5
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended response for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the issue(s) you experienced:
script.routing_logic: Only respondents who answered 'Yes' to Q5

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the brand(s) of outdoor adventure gear you purchased to others?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any gear type in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for recommendations.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the brand(s) of outdoor adventure gear you purchased to others?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any gear type in Q2

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in outdoor adventure gear?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in outdoor adventure gear?

questions.question_text: How do you typically research outdoor adventure gear before purchasing? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand research behavior.
